ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors are grateful to Dr. Ivanka Dimitrova from the Department of Botany at the University of Plovdiv “Paisii Hilendarski” in Plovdiv, Bulgaria for identification of the plant species as Laurus nobilis L. The authors thank the abbot of the Bulgarian Monastery Hilendar in Athos, Greece, for his initiative and permission to study the chemical composition of leaves from centuries-old wild laurel trees for the purpose of further industrial processing. Authors are grateful the University of Plovdiv “Paisii Hilendarski”, Bulgaria, the University of Food Technologies in Plovdiv, Bulgaria, and to Oregon State University, U.S.A. All these institutions provided encouragement and significant in-kind support such as access to laboratories, other infrastructure, and research instrumentation.
